Reviews.Title: “Value for money”
Reviews.Author: Marijke V
Reviews.Content: agon hotel situated 500m platz clean situated residential night silent sleep breakfastbuffet pay additonal 8 euro amount money fresh bread assortment cheese meat berlin stay

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay forfßHisffsdgghsosgsig”
Reviews.Author: Joe_Cobb
Reviews.Content: wife stayed february hotel positive negative aspect positives staff extremely friendly receptionist breakfast staff housekeeping ladies keen help requested smile german isnt tried language politely replied english location located hotel ideal location wide selection bars restaurants set street hustle bustle peaceful 5 minute walk nearest ubahn ten minutes centre berlin breakfast breakfast selection plentiful standard continental options breads meets cheeses range cereals cooked options everyday negatives noise hotel constructed shortage stone walls paper sharing people door keen getting acquainted reguarly probably keen id told shut smokey smoking ban uk tend granted tend smell fresh leave smelling musty corridors definetly smokey despite smoking signs pregnant wife wasnt happy didnt pay roof stay didnt feel aggrieved negative aspects looking expensive base trip berlin recommend luxuries advise looking elsewhere

Reviews.Title: “Agon Franke”
Reviews.Author: hurstyv
Reviews.Content: hotel easy walking distance nearest ubahn walk hearty breakfast 6th floor door knocked smell cigarettes window unbearable lady reception smoking office 2nd floor hesitation brighter tidier traditional german corner ubahn called 2 delicious meals sampled differant german beers worth visit nice time breakfast organised plentiful half hour serving times morning

Reviews.Title: “Good location for a weekend break”
Reviews.Author: pippikit
Reviews.Content: visit berlin easy reach 110 bus tegel airport clean comfortable shower pleased free safe staff friendly helpful recommend buffet breakfast value 8 euros downside street noise saturday night easy public transport ubahn buses adenauerplatz minutes walk berlin welcome card plan stay days travel discounts nearby bar restaurant serves german food

Reviews.Title: “Value for the money”
Reviews.Author: Szilvia S
Reviews.Content: simple hotel location ubahn underground station platz lidl netto cheap plus distance breakfast buffet lots breads sausages cheese etc reach city center mitte ubahn 40 minutes clean furnished service excellent

Reviews.Title: “Affordable and welcoming hotel in great location.”
Reviews.Author: AndyVengeance
Reviews.Content: hotel agon berlin wonderful hotel star rating price range location perfect 10 minute walk charlottenburg sbahn station located quiet city shopping street kurfurstendamm staff welcoming 24 hour service reception desk safe fairly basic clean cleaned everyday

Reviews.Title: “Good value hotel in good position”
Reviews.Author: annh44
Reviews.Content: unlike reviews found agon hotel close main thoroughfare convenient buses trains staff courteous helpful breakfast excellent reasonably adequate bathroom appeared brand pity lounge expected paying price hotel complaints

Reviews.Title: “well-positioned and great value for monwy”
Reviews.Author: Europhila
Reviews.Content: hotel situated mere five minutes adenauerplatz underground station city easily accessible hotel clean adequately furnished towels bedlinen regularly changed breakfast excellent staff accommodating especially required earlier breakfast normal day stroll offers plenty eat recommend turkish restaurant serves delicious reasonably priced food tasteful surroundings serves pizzas beware hidden 25 cover charge recommend hotel location modest budget

Reviews.Title: “A place to sleep - but a little too far from the center”
Reviews.Author: xo919
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 4 nights staff nice main beds werent main hotel location close busses subway station nights frequency goes leave hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, better than its reputation.”
Reviews.Author: Anonima66
Reviews.Content: booked hotel due low fees proposed reviews ok booking read discouraging reviews doubt decision glad chance hotel yes clean windows insulating cold little traffic street floors breakfast smokefree breakfasts ok abundant personnel helpful worry value money comparing 3star hotel london tips walk airport ubahn adenauerplatz bus 110 towards bus stop
